description: Meta-data describing the JSON-BL payload object.

version.description: The JBL version used to describe the document.

generator.description: Name of the application or project used to generate the document.

authors.description: The people involved in the creation of the document.

items.description: Details for a single author of the document.

alias.description: A brief nickname, signature, or initials used to quickly associate the author with other parts of the document. Should be unique per document.

name.description: Full name of the person to attribute to the document.

role.description: What action or role did the author perform in the document.

history.description: Details of the changes made to the document.

created_at.description: A time stamp for when the document was first generated or created.

updated_at.description: A time stamp for when the document was last updated.

changes.description: An array of changes in chronological order performed by the authors.

by_alias.description: The alias of the author who performed the change

location.description: Name of the location where the change was performed.

version.description: Version of the document that resulted from this change.

digest.description: The digest hash used to confirm the document has not been tampered with in transit.

algorithm.description: The type of digest algorithm to use, as described by the JBL standard.

value.description: Actual value of the digest obtained from performing the algorithm.

signature.description: The signature used to confirm the document was truly generated by the author.

algorithm.description: The type of digest algorithm to use, as described by the JBL standard.

value.description: Actual value of the digital signature obtained from performing the algorithm.

x509_data.description: X509 certificate data used to sign the documents data.
